siyaluma naw thotawal saha warayawal, rajaye idam pawaradima saha janawasa wyapruthi, pradhana warikarmantha, patashalawala kalamanakaranaya nadaththuwa ha parikshana baharakota prathamika, dwithiya ha usas adhyapanaya, niyamitha poth, patamala ha wibhaga, khanija thel, nyashtika shakthiya athuluwa widuli balaya ha shakthiya, parisara aarakshawa ha panshu rakshanaya, gammana kala lesa wen karana lada eewa hara kala aarakshawa, prayojanayata ganima ha yali ropanaya, aanduwalata ayath nathi wideshiya sanwidhanawala aadhara, upath wiwaha ha marana liyapadinchi kirima, pudgalayan liyapadinchi kirima ha idam liyapadinchi kirima, aagamika katayuthu (rajaye aadhara saha prathipaththimaya karunu) rajaye idam ha idam prathisanskaranaya, komisamata pawara gena athi idam paripalanaya, sanskruthiyata ayath purawidyawa ha parani lekhana ha natabun aaraksha kirima.

aaloka kadambayak wata eekarashi wu meru samuhayak se ema rathriye ema dasuna mata diswiya.aalokaya nagenne sukhdew sahodarayage pariganakayeni.siyallo wata wi madar indiya chithrapataya balathi.pariganakaya surya koshayakin pana ganwa thibe.chithrapata lolinge thuwakku katawal ahasa wetha hari thibuni.kamla thula unanduwak nathiwa seya.chithrapata kerehi unanduwak naddayi mama agen asami."naha akka.mama balanne pahara dime jawanika thibena widiyo witharayi" aya kiwaya.mema pahara dime jawanika sahitha widiyo pata gana mama pasuwa sukhdewgen asuwemi.asipiya helana mohothin ohu mata ewannak dhawanaya kota penwiya.
